content:
For example, a newly bought vase costs around 20 Three-Leaf Clovers,
a new single-seater sofa is 50 Three-Leaf Clovers,
Hm? How to convert it?

<color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>, it's you.
I'm having trouble deciding what stuff
to take to Glenn for recycling.

Each world bubble seems to have its own unique products,
like special minerals, plants,
or... wildgrass.

This old chair might work, no...
Maybe this ore instead, wait...
It's so hard to decide.

Remember Glenn's recycling feature?
Turn your odds and ends into Dough, then go shopping,
And just like that, a Three-Leaf Clover becomes a new vase.

It's true that we only realize the value of things
when we're about to lose them.
How embarrassing of me. (shakes head)

Did Glenn tell you that you can trade
collected materials like wildgrass and trash
with him for some Dough?
